title: CH163 3 Seater Sofa
body: Get Inspired by Hans J. Wegner, the CH163 sofa in 1965, is a down filling for luxurious comfort. This large, three-seater sofa neatly exemplifies how Wegner often highlighted structural details to great effect. A solid wood, down molded cold foam, CH163 is a beautiful and luxurious sofa, which fits perfect in a modern home.
